Class HttpSseReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.AbstractReceiver
      • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.http.HttpSseReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Receiver, com.launchdarkly.eventsource.background.BackgroundEventHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SharedHttpSseReceiver
    public class HttpSseReceiver
extends AbstractReceiver
implements com.launchdarkly.eventsource.background.BackgroundEventHandler
    Receives SSE (server sent events) from nJAMS as HTTP Client Communication

    bwand

        public void connect()
        Description copied from class: AbstractReceiver
        This method should be used to create a connection, and if the startup fails, close all resources. It will be called by the reconnect method. It should throw an Exception if anything unexpected or unwanted happens.
